article_title: Since You Asked: Moda isn't the first arena namesake to hit hard times
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: I saw on the news last week that Moda Health Plans is being required by the Oregon Insurance Division to raise capital or reduce its operations. Isn't this the same company that spent millions to rename the Rose Garden just a couple of years ago?— Max H., TalentModa Health Plans, the former ODS Health which traces its roots back to the Oregon Dental Society, took a swing at the big time in August 2013 when it acquired the naming rights to the Rose Garden from the Trail Blazers.
